InfoScreen.Text: Video game questionnaire The following questions are about video games you have played during the past year.

ChoiceQuestion.Name: video_games
ChoiceQuestion.Text: Over the last 12 months, how many hours a week have you played games in each of the following categories? Example: If you play 1.5 hrs/week, mark "1+ to 3"

Label.Text: FIRST PERSON SHOOTERS (Halo, Call of Duty, Gears of War, GTA, Half-Life, Unreal etc)
ACTION/ACTION-SPORTS GAMES (God of War, Mario Kart, Burnout, Madden, FIFA, etc)
REAL TIME STRATEGY GAMES (Warcraft, Starcraft, Command & Conquer, Age of Empires, etc)
TURN-BASED STRATEGY/PUZZLE GAMES (Civilization, Sims, Puzzle Quest, Bejewled, Solitaire, etc)
ROLE-PLAYING/FANTASY GAMES (World of Warcraft, Final Fantasy, Fable, Oblivion, etc)
MUSIC GAMES (Guitar Hero, Dance Dance Revolution, Rock Band, etc)
